mcq.statement: What does the idiom 'fall between two stools' mean?

options.b: To be unable to decide between two options
options.c: To fail because of indecision between two alternatives
options.d: To catch someone doing something wrong

mcq.one_liner: The idiom 'fall between two stools' means to fail because of indecision between two alternatives or by not being adequately suited to either.
